content: make this stunning pastel blanket for your home or a special new arrival - specially designed by sue rawlinson of sweetpea family crochet approx 89 x 132 cm / 35 x 52 including border stylecraft special dk 322yrds/294m 3 5oz/100g cream 1005 2 balls mid blue cloud blue 1019 1 ball dark pink fondant 1241 1 ball dark green lincoln 1834 1 ball lemon 1020 1 ball light blue sherbert 1034 1 ball light pink candyfloss 1130 1 ball light green spring green 1316 1 ball size 4mm & 5mm crochet hooks gauge 17 sts x 10 row to 10x10cm over pattern using 4mm hook
